title: UPV Correction Event
description: Defines the structure for a single correction event used to calculate Uncertainty Proxy Variance (UPV) as per Amendment 001.

event_id.description: A unique identifier for the correction event (e.g., UUID).

timestamp.description: The ISO 8601 timestamp of when the correction was logged.

cognitive_cycle_id.description: The identifier for the cognitive cycle that produced the original statement.

original_statement.description: The full text of the invalidated statement.

original_marker.description: The epistemic marker of the invalidated statement.

correction_source.description: The entity that initiated the correction.

correction_reason.description: A brief, human-readable reason for the invalidation.
